price: (19) And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ سَكۡرَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنۡهُ تَحِيدُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wajāat sakratu al-mawti bil-ḥaqi dhālika mā kunta min'hu taḥīdu
